content:
My friend who emigrated to Spain posted that he had to go to the Emergency Room today. Instead of it breaking his bank account, the visit only cost him €16.

We are being ripped off in ways we don't even realize by the US health “care” non-system which is designed to maximize corporate profits by bankrupting patients.

We need a new model and should adopt one of the universal health care models that get much better health care outcomes than ours. #universalhealthcare #medicareforall #USpol

content:
How do we move health care back onto the political agenda? After the 2020 primaries and the failure of Build Back Better to pass, it has completely disappeared off the radar.

I know what we can't pass federally with a Republican-controlled House, and why we can't pass it with Manchin & Sinema in the Senate.

But what CAN we do to move towards universal access to health care, especially at the state level?

Is anyone up for a #CalCare ballot initiative?
#UniversalHealthCare

card.description: The founders of Physicians for a National Health Program put single-payer health care on the map. Now, discussing the next phase of the movement, they say even single-payer won’t be enough to fix the problems caused by continued privatization.

content:
After all that fierce debate over #MedicareForAll versus a #PublicOption, we haven't even closed the #Medicaid coverage gap in the red states, and now Republicans want to gut #Medicaid entirely (and would gut #Medicare and the #ACA too, if they thought they could get away with it).

Yes, I know there is a limited Medicare drug pricing bill that was passed, but it is so little compared to what we hoped for in 2020.
#HealthCare #HealthInsurance #UniversalHealthCare

content:
My friend who emigrated to Spain posted that he had to go to the Emergency Room today. Instead of it breaking his bank account, the visit only cost him €16.

We are being ripped off in ways we don't even realize by the US health “care” non-system which is designed to maximize corporate profits by bankrupting patients.

We need a new model and should adopt one of the universal health care models that get much better health care outcomes than ours. #universalhealthcare #medicareforall #USpol

account.note: Actor, Writer, Transit Advocate, Gay and Proud, Disco/House/EDM, animal lover, Practitioner of the Science of Mind and Spirit, Angel in disguise

content:
Even if we have health insurance through our jobs, it still sucks. We end up paying 10-20% of our paycheck towards our share of the premium, and still have big deductibles and copays on top of that .

We could pay less for a single payer system through universal taxes and have better health care outcomes. #healthcare #healthinsurance #singlepayer #medicareforall

content:
I'm open to which universal healthcare system we use. There are models for this all over the world. Medicare-For-All is one approach. But our profit-driven insurance system simply isn't working. #MedicareForAll #UniversalHealthCare

card.title: We Don’t Just Need Medicare for All — We Need a National Health System
card.description: The founders of Physicians for a National Health Program put single-payer health care on the map. Now, discussing the next phase of the movement, they say even single-payer won’t be enough to fix the problems caused by continued privatization.

content:
After all that fierce debate over #MedicareForAll versus a #PublicOption, we haven't even closed the #Medicaid coverage gap in the red states, and now Republicans want to gut #Medicaid entirely (and would gut #Medicare and the #ACA too, if they thought they could get away with it).

Yes, I know there is a limited Medicare drug pricing bill that was passed, but it is so little compared to what we hoped for in 2020.
#HealthCare #HealthInsurance #UniversalHealthCare
https://www.commondreams.org/news/gop-debt-limit-bill-could-put-over-10-million-at-risk-of-losing-medicaid-analysis

content: For all the ferocious debate in the 2020 Democratic Presidential Primary about whether we'd support #MedicareForAll or a #PublicOption, we had a rare Democratic trifecta and couldn't even close the #Medicaid coverage gap in the red states. Meaningful change like #SocialSecurity, #Medicare, and the #ACA required large Democratic trifectas to pass. #politics #USpol #healthcare

A for-profit insurance-based health care non-system kills people.

#MedicareForAll Movement Call

Aug 16, 2023 08:00 PM Eastern Time, virtual event
Join the Nurses' Campaign to Win Medicare for All for the first of our quarterly, nationwide Medicare for All Movement Calls!

These calls will provide an opportunity for Medicare for All activists around the country to come together in a shared space, hear from each other, and receive training on tactics for organizing in our communities.

content:
Medical students to the AMA: Drop your opposition to Medicare for All!

Students from across the U.S. are testifying in support of a resolution urging the American Medical Association to drop its decades-long opposition to #SinglePayer #MedicareForAll.

We have high hopes that the resolution will pass the Medical Student Section and will be working hard to make sure the AMA heeds the demands of its future members!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UhCwSZ2Mud4
